Warnings
  • 2 scrollbars?
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/vscrollbar

Function Figure vscrollbar(Figure f, FProperty props ...)
Description Embed figure f in a vertical scrollbar.

Also see scrollbar and hscrollbar.
Examples 
box1 = box(size(200,100), fillColor("Blue"));
render(vscrollbar(box1));


2 scrollbars?
